results.title: TCV-116 inhibits interstitial fibrosis and HSP47 mRNA in rat obstructive nephropathy.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_candesartan_cilexetil @CHEMICAL_MESH:C077793 @@@TCV-116@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ significantly ameliorated the fibrotic change of interstitium seven days after @<m>DISEASE_Airway_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000402 @@@obstruction@@@.

citations.NLM: Moriyama T, Kawada N, Akagi Y, Ando A, Horio M, Yamauchi A, Nagata K, Imai E, Hori M. TCV-116 inhibits interstitial fibrosis and HSP47 mRNA in rat obstructive nephropathy. Kidney Int Suppl. 1997 Dec;63():S232-5. PMID: 9407468

results.title: Antihypertensive drug-induced angioedema causing upper airway obstruction in children.
results.text_hl: At our institution, we describe 3 children who developed acute @DISEASE_Angioedema @DISEASE_MESH:D000799 @@@angioedema@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Airway_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000402 @@@upper airway obstruction@@@ after the chronic use of antihypertensive medications [2 drugs in the ACE inhibitor class (@CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@), and 1 drug in the calcium channel blocker class (CCB; @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@)].

citations.NLM: Hom KA, Hirsch R, Elluru RG. Antihypertensive drug-induced angioedema causing upper airway obstruction in children. Int J Pediatr Otorhinolaryngol. 2012 Jan;76(1):14-9. PMID: 21885133
citations.BibTeX: @article{21885133, title={Antihypertensive drug-induced angioedema causing upper airway obstruction in children.}, author={Hom KA and Hirsch R and Elluru RG}, journal={Int J Pediatr Otorhinolaryngol}, volume={76}, number={1}, pages={14-9}}

results.title: A rare presentation of angioedema with isolated retropharyngeal and supraglottic involvement
results.journal: J Community Hosp Intern Med Perspect
results.text_hl: We present a case of a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ on @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ therapy for one year who experienced severe @<m>DISEASE_Airway_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000402 @@@airway compromise@@@ without the classic symptoms of ACE inhibitor induced @DISEASE_Angioedema @DISEASE_MESH:D000799 @@@angioedema@@@.

citations.NLM: Patel H, Kant S, Chow R. A rare presentation of angioedema with isolated retropharyngeal and supraglottic involvement J Community Hosp Intern Med Perspect. 2019;9(1):36-39. PMID: 30788074
citations.BibTeX: @article{30788074, title={A rare presentation of angioedema with isolated retropharyngeal and supraglottic involvement}, author={Patel H and Kant S and Chow R}, journal={J Community Hosp Intern Med Perspect}, volume={9}, number={1}, pages={36-39}}

results.title: Life threatening angioedema in a patient on ACE inhibitor (ACEI) confined to the upper airway
results.text_hl: In 10% of cases it can progress to life threatening @<m>DISEASE_Airway_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000402 @@@airway obstruction@@@ and endotracheal intubation.

citations.NLM: Tharayil AM, Chanda AH, Shiekh HA, Elkhatib MS, Nayeemuddin M, Alshamandy AA. Life threatening angioedema in a patient on ACE inhibitor (ACEI) confined to the upper airway Qatar Med J. 2014;2014(2):92-7. PMID: 25745598

results.title: Angioedema of the airway: an unusual case.
results.text_hl: In the reported case, our @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was unfortunate enough to be @DISEASE_Drug_Hypersensitivity @DISEASE_MESH:D004342 @@@allergic@@@ to both @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Lidocaine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008012 @@@lignocaine@@@.

citations.NLM: Roper AJ, Farragher A, Homer JJ, Helbert M. Angioedema of the airway: an unusual case. J Laryngol Otol. 2007 Aug;121(8):e11. PMID: 17537275
citations.BibTeX: @article{17537275, title={Angioedema of the airway: an unusual case.}, author={Roper AJ and Farragher A and Homer JJ and Helbert M}, journal={J Laryngol Otol}, volume={121}, number={8}, pages={e11}}
